page.title: 11TOURISM continued
page.content: A former Blacksmith's shop can be seen and the discerning visitor will find many places of interest. Staindrop is one of County Durham's Green Villages and the whole of the area around the green creates the overall charm and unique character of the village. The green is the focus of village life in times of communal festivities. A measure of the tourist attractions of Staindrop may be found in the visitor's book in St Mary's Church, where it can be seen that people visited the area from all over the world from countries like the U.S.A., Spain, Austria, Denmark, Germany and Canada. During the past 16 months 699 people have signed the visitor's book.
